name: Pandora's Box (1999)
description: Seven mythical tricksters escape from Pandora's Box to wreak havoc on the world. Thus begins a journey that includes 10 designs and 350 puzzles. It's up to you to solve them, capture the tricksters, and save the world from chaos. Solve 3-D puzzles specially designed for the computer. The puzzles don't require a lot of time to learn, yet they are progressively challenging to master. An overall mission provides a purpose for completing the puzzles. Game-play options allow you to follow the game's story line or jump directly to your favorite puzzle.
